title: Mobile Microlearning Course for Enhancing Scholarly Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Basic Digital Literacy and Understanding of Secondary Education Curricula
context.additional_context: A course for in-service middle school teachers focusing on cultivating the ability to effectively collect, analyze, and apply academic information in lessons. Learning activities are structured using mobile devices in asynchronous online environments.

learning_goals: Learners can perform the process of searching and selecting credible educational materials from academic databases with over 80% accuracy
Learners demonstrate the competency to critically evaluate collected information and apply it to instructional design
Learners can recognize emotional barriers encountered during information retrieval and propose strategies to overcome them
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
